thread.title: BRIEF-P&G Acquires the Consumer Health Business Of Merck KGaA, Darmstadt, Germany

title: BRIEF-P&G Acquires the Consumer Health Business Of Merck KGaA, Darmstadt, Germany

organizations.name: consumer health business of merck kgaa
brief-p&g acquires the consumer health business of

text:
April 19, 2018 / 4:06 AM / Updated an hour ago BRIEF-P&G Acquires the Consumer Health Business Of Merck KGaA, Darmstadt, Germany Reuters Staff 
April 19 (Reuters) - Procter & Gamble Co: 
* ACQUIRES THE CONSUMER HEALTH BUSINESS OF MERCK KGAA, DARMSTADT, GERMANY 
* SAYS ANNOUNCED IT HAS SIGNED AN AGREEMENT TO ACQUIRE CONSUMER HEALTH BUSINESS OF MERCK KGAA, DARMSTADT, GERMANY 
* HAS SIGNED AGREEMENT TO ACQUIRE CONSUMER HEALTH BUSINESS OF MERCK KGAA, FOR PURCHASE PRICE OF ABOUT 3.4 BILLION EURO Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
